definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Balaam (acc. to Sta:§ 293 = [[בלע]] + [[ם]]; Nbr:Stud. Bib. i, 226 prop. [[בל]] = [[בעל]] + (god) [[עם]]), son of [[בְּעוֹר]], prophet fr. [[פְּתוֹר]] (q.v.):—Nu 22:5, Nu 22:7, Nu 22:8, Nu 22:9 + 47 t. Nu 22 – Nu 24 (all JE) Nu 31:8, Nu 31:16 (P) De 23:5, De 23:6 (D) (cf. R:D Jos 13:22) Jos 24:9, Jos 24:10 (E) Mic 6:5, Ne 13:2.
